messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] future unschooling conferences
messages.msgSnippet: Oh Karin, I m so glad you chimed in and said you wanted to help because I was definitely going to ask for your help.  lol Kelly hasn t approved of Phx for
messages.messageBody:
Oh Karin, I'm so glad you chimed in and said you wanted to help because I
was definitely going to ask for your help. lol Kelly hasn't "approved" of
Phx for 2009 yet. So we'll see what happens. But I think this conference
is just what PHoenix needs!

Shannon
-----Original Message-----
From: Karin




Wow, Shannon! I had no idea you'd be willing to take on such a big
project.
You can definitely count on my help, too.
Let's see - 2009 is in 5 years. Ben will be 18 and Jon will be 16. Yikes!
It's scary just thinking about that. ;-)
Seems like there are lots of offers being made for upcoming conference
locations.
Maybe there will have to be more than one a year pretty soon.

Karin
in Phoenix
